framework: Enhanced DSV (Deconstruct, Synthesize, and Verify) with Dynamic Examples
input_sentence: if Ego vehicle in front of other vehicle then it must not brake suddenly without a compelling reason.

atomic_propositions.description: Ego vehicle is in front of other vehicle
Ego vehicle has a compelling reason

temporal_relations.description: If ego vehicle is in front of other vehicle, then it must not brake suddenly without compelling reason

metric_constraints.description: Sudden braking is prohibited without compelling reason

ego_front.action: is in front of other vehicle

stage_results.agent_response:
```json
{
  "construction_steps": [
    "Map ap_1 to in_front_of(ego,other)",
    "Map ap_2 to brakes_suddenly(ego)",
    "Map ap_3 to has_compelling_reason(ego)",
    "Apply global property 'Always' → G",
    "Construct conditional relation: in_front_of(ego,other) → ¬brakes_suddenly(ego) ∨ has_compelling_reason(ego)",
    "Combine into final formula with global operator"
  ],
  "mtl_formula": "G (in_front_of(ego,other) → (¬brakes_suddenly(ego) ∨ has_compelling_reason(ego)))"
}
```

synthesis_result.synthesis_reasoning: Map ap_1 to in_front_of(ego,other); Map ap_2 to brakes_suddenly(ego); Map ap_3 to has_compelling_reason(ego); Apply global property 'Always' → G; Construct conditional relation: in_front_of(ego,other) → ¬brakes_suddenly(ego) ∨ has_compelling_reason(ego); Combine into final formula with global operator

analyst.name: Analyst_Agent
analyst.description: Responsible for deconstructing natural language into structured semantic components

synthesizer.name: Synthesizer_Agent
synthesizer.description: Responsible for synthesizing syntactically correct MTL formulas from semantic components

verifier.name: Verifier_Agent
verifier.description: Responsible for verifying the semantic correctness of MTL formulas through back-translation
